    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Customization
     
    CustomizationPane
    Customization Pane for Restaurant Management System This pane allows customers to customize their selected menu items
    DatabaseConnection
    Database Connection Manager for Restaurant Management System Handles PostgreSQL database connections with connection pooling
    DatabaseConnection.TransactionCallback
    Functional interface for transaction callbacks
    dbSetup
    Database Setup for Restaurant Management System Handles PostgreSQL database connections with connection pooling
    Employee
    Employee class for Restaurant Management System Handles employee data, authentication, and role management
    Ingredient
     
    InvOrder
     
    LoginPane
    Modern Login Pane for Restaurant Management System Employee Sign In interface with numeric keypad
    LoginPane.LoginCallback
    Interface for login callback
    ManagerDAO
    Data access layer for manager features.
    ManagerDAO.CustomizationRow
     
    ManagerDAO.EmployeeRow
     
    ManagerDAO.EmployeeSalesRow
     
    ManagerDAO.InvOrderRow
    Unified DTO: includes both naming styles for compatibility.
    ManagerDAO.MenuRow
    Detailed menu with aggregated ingredients/customizations (Version B)
    ManagerDAO.OrderItemRow
    Order item retrieval (Version A)
    ManagerDAO.OrderRow
    Unified DTO: includes fields from both branches to maintain compatibility.
    ManagerDAO.UsageRow
     
    ManagerDAO.XReportHourRow
     
    ManagerDAO.XReportSummary
     
    ManagerDAO.ZReportData
     
    ManagerDAO.ZReportEmployeeRow
     
    ManagerEmployeePane
    Manager UI: Dashboard, Menu (with attach/detach), Ingredients, Customizations, Employees, Orders (with items), Inventory Orders, X-Report, Z-Report, Usage Report.
    ManagerEmployeePane.InventoryItem
     
    Menu
     
    MenuPane
    Menu Pane for Restaurant Management System This pane displays the restaurant menu and allows customers to browse items
    MenuPane.MenuItem
    REMOVE ONCE MANAGER MENU IS UPDATED ///
    Order
    Order class for Restaurant Management System Handles orders and order items
    OrderItem
    OrderItem class for Restaurant Management System Handles order items and their customizations
    RestaurantApp
    Main JavaFX Application for Restaurant Management System This application contains 5 main panes for different functionalities
